description: Back at it for Winter. Teaching a special topics course on personal informatics.
Two new preprints! Measuring Menses and A Life of Data.
First day of classes. Teaching IN4MATX 133 and 231 this quarter.
CHI submissions made! Proud of the work my students and collaborators submitted.
Visiting student Dakyung Go from the I‑SURF program explored how mobility impairments impact activity tracker use.
Received a small grant from the Clue Research Innovation Program to examine fertility tracking practices.
Great poster session for the Ubiquitous Computing class!
Awarded a small interal grant to examine the design of data-driven stickers on social media.
NSF CRII Awarded! Examining multimodal approaches to food journaling.
First day of Winter Quarter. Teaching graduate-level Ubiquitous Computing.
